content: Referring to errata 1517, peanut allergy code is removed from value set. what is the plan to integrate with FHIR? Do we plan to have it back in CCDA?

Referring to errata 1517, peanut allergy code is removed from value set. what is the plan to integrate with FHIR? Do we plan to have it back in CCDA?

Ozlem, I just checked the value set for allergens and found that peanuts is there.

Clinical Substance 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.2 762952008 Peanut (substance) SNOMEDCT 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 2019-03

What code are you referring to and what value set are you specifically looking at in C-CDA and in FHIR. Are we doing something inconsistent?
These are the codes provided: SNOMED: 256349002 or ICD10: Z91.010
